lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I think everyone in the world should have what they need in order to provide for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Nikolay
lender.loan_because: we all need help one way or another.
lender.occupational_info: I'm dependent on my parents at this time but someday I will be a productive part of the community. I love my baby brother Alex, race cars, trains & airplanes. I'm 3 yrs old & we will have another baby soon. WE LOVE KIVA!!!

lender.name: Brad and 'Auli'i
lender.loan_because: we didn't need a new toaster when we got married and figured there was a better way to channel that spirit of matrimonial giving. The generosity of friends and family has provided us with the opportunity to give others a chance they may not otherwise have.

lender.name: Cameron
lender.loan_because: Social Darwinism is a bunch of crap.

lender.name: Eric
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at Stanford University in California.

lender.name: Roberta
lender.occupational_info: Technology

lender.name: BUND-Reichenau
lender.occupational_info: We are the local group of a large german environmental organisation. The group exists since 1984.

lender.name: Ubuntu
lender.loan_because: I am BECAUSE WE are. I loan because I believe we all deserve the opportunity to create wealth for our families.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Haircolorist and a Salon Owner. I feel that beauty can be enhanced on the outside but comes from within.

lender.name: The Kids From John Ross Robertson
Jackson
lender.loan_because: I want to help others have a better life, like mine. I am blessed with a loving supportive family and friends. I share in a vision that everyone deserves the opportunity to work and be successful.
lender.occupational_info: I do alot of writing and learning my letters and sounds. I am starting to read. I am a volunteer at our local soup kitchen. I am young but interested in making the world better and more peaceful. I have started my new business called 3 crafts and a beverage.

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.loan_because: I can have a real impact in someone's life instead of buying more stuff.

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: we all need help sometimes.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of children who are sick or injured in school. I also check their heights and weights, vision, and hearing, and make sure they have had a physical and dental examination, among other things!

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I heard about Micro-Loans on NPR and thought it was a great idea. Didn't decide to do it until 101 Cookbooks decided to put together a lending team! What a great idea!
lender.occupational_info: My company sells science, math, engineering, and technology curriculum to schools and afterschool programs for kids age 6-20.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: Loaning money for business purposes is a productive use of capital.
lender.occupational_info: I began a business in a bedroom in 1992 and now it's a company that employs more than a dozen people

lender.name: Will
lender.loan_because: I want to directly help people empower themselves with the help of micro-finance.
lender.occupational_info: Have a strong interest in development issues and reducing global inequalities.Currently a student and volunteer.

lender.name: MINT ENTERTAINMENT
lender.loan_because: I KNOW WE ARE MAKING A DIFFERENCE.
lender.occupational_info: WE ARE A AGENCY THAT SUPPLYS 18YRS AND OLDER MODELS FOR PHOTOSHOOTS, PROMOTIONAL MODELLING, CATWALK AND ALSO 18+ ENTERTAINMENT IN AUSTRALIA

lender.name: eleonora
lender.occupational_info: Working for ICT inclusion also volounteer for italian version of http://www.globalvoicesonline.org

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I believe putting funds directly into the hands of small-scale entrepreneurs is an efficient way to affect change in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer in a school where all students prepare for college, even though they are the first generation of their families to do so. In the 10 years the school has been in operation, 100% of graduates have attended 4-year colleges.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I just want to help!

lender.name: susan
lender.loan_because: this seems like an easy way to be of help to others.

lender.name: wayne & debi
lender.loan_because: we have been blessed by finding each other

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I can, and because we are connected.
lender.occupational_info: I worked at a university library until I retired (doing statistics on our website usage).

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: I care about people all around the world!

lender.name: John Pastor
lender.occupational_info: I provide military consulting services on behalf of a private corporation operating out of California to international clients. Our specialties are small unit tactics, asset preservation, and personal security.

lender.name: mudito & Bodhi
lender.loan_because: We too had help during our working lives!
lender.occupational_info: Artists

lender.name: stacey
lender.loan_because: i want to support others the way that others have supported me.
lender.occupational_info: i work in an office at a cinema school, where the students are learning to make films and television shows.

lender.name: Carrie
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I am a college student studying political science, history, and writing.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: I have more than I need.
lender.occupational_info: I go to a public high school every weekday for seven hours each day.

lender.name: Dominic
lender.loan_because: to have a car to delevery pizza
lender.occupational_info: student an informatic

lender.name: G.M.
lender.loan_because: I want to see a better world.
lender.occupational_info: I don't know if microfinance could really eliminate poverty? or it would foster capitalism and maintain/ increase the gap between the rich and the poor?

lender.name: Ronny
lender.loan_because: I prefer loans to charity. I think the responsibility that comes with a loan, creates a positive incentive to work harder and do better. Charity, outside of extreme emergencies fail because they do not create appropriate incentives or do anything useful. Exceptions exist of course.

lender.name: Liza
lender.loan_because: It seems like a good thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I break software that is written by the company I work for.

lender.name: Jerome Shore
lender.loan_because: I want to plant seeds.
lender.occupational_info: I coach people to be all that they can be.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I'm very happy to be able to help others in such a meaningful way. If I can even do a little bit to help a hardworking entrepreneur toward their goal, how could I resist?
lender.occupational_info: I am attending graduate school, studying history. Basically we do a lot of reading, and prepare long essays on various historical topics. I am studying critiques of the environmental destruction in East Germany around about 1970.

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves opportunity.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: i want my money to make a difference in someones life
lender.occupational_info: i help people get disability and retirement benefits

lender.name: Richard
lender.occupational_info:
I'm studying to be a developmental economist.
Someday, I'll help countries get to where they want to be.

lender.name: mul
lender.loan_because: for the operational costs of free education for poor children
lender.occupational_info: provide basic education for poor children. there are about 35 children to be built.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others!

lender.name: Pedro
lender.occupation: Currently unemployed but will be working!
lender.loan_because: it's cool and awesome to make a difference in other people's life. Also because I myself experienced poverty first hand in America.

lender.name: Kirby and Judy
lender.loan_because: We would like to show kindness to those who are willing to work hard and hopefully send a message that people showing kindness to each other, regardless of race, nationality or religion is a better way to solve the world's problems than leaving it up to our politicians.
lender.occupational_info: Kirby has been a dentist for 35 years and Judy has worked in the dental office and been a homemaker for the same time. Married for 40 years and have 2 sons and one daughter-in-law (who told us about Kiva)

lender.name: Wes
lender.loan_because: it makes a difference

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I want to.

lender.name: Heny Wijaya
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Gregory
lender.loan_because: The power of entrepreneurship can not just empower the indivdual but a nation.

lender.name: Ivan
lender.loan_because: This world is wrong in so many ways, new ideas and new technology like Kiva can help us to make a difference and change it! Who would miss a chance to be a part of that positive change?
lender.occupational_info: I communicate with various entrepreneurs and IT managers in large companies, screen their business needs and try to support them offering different IT solutions which are then implemented by my colleagues.

lender.name: Fatima
lender.loan_because: we are now 10 months already delayed in our house rental.we were not enable to pay because our situation for how many months already are in bad situation due to its lack of capital.So to boost it,we need more capital to raise it inshaa'Allaah.And one more thing,I found a good location for an internet cafe.And inshaa'Allah,if I'm able to lend here, I am going to open it exclusive for females only. Since many Muslimah here that always go for a cafe needs this inshaa'Allaah.This will be the way inshaa'Allaah ta'ala can help for our daily lives especially that we have 6 kids alhamdulillaah.I hope someone could help us for this inshaa'Allaah.I need 1,000 dollars for this inshaa'Allaah.
lender.occupational_info: I'm only a housewife but i am also helping sometimes my husband on his business.As of now we a small business of a shawarma shop that runs only a little profit but alhamdulillaah it still surviving that enough for our foods only.So to be able to help my husband,I found a good location for an internet cafe.So that's why I am here now trying to make a loan inshaa'Allaah.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: I believe it can make a true difference

lender.name: Slick
lender.loan_because: I believe despite politics, religion, culture and borders, people are people--everyone deserves an opportunity to make for themselves a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I assist students in furthering their education at a University level.

lender.name: Lance
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Ayliza
lender.loan_because:
I feel privileged to be in a position where I can help another person make something better of their life. It makes me happy to know I can make a tiny bit of difference :)
I like to browse and take the time to choose something that appeals to me in a personal way, that way it becomes a gift to myself, which makes this fun as well as charity.

lender.name: Marco & Anita
lender.loan_because: I and my mother belive into microcredit and we think this is the best way to help poor people. In this way we lent money and they become responsible.

lender.name: Artsi Bitsi
lender.loan_because: I would rather give a hand-up, than a hand-out.
lender.occupational_info: I make fun pouches for phones and cameras. You can see examples on my website.

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with a wonderful life and I want to help those that are less fortunate than me.

lender.name: Maria José
lender.occupation: Student and call center worker and traveler

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: In memory of my mother, Ann Selden Hutchinson, and my father, Douglas Charles Hutchinson. No Pasaran.

lender.name: Ivan
lender.loan_because: i want to help!

lender.name: Katharine
lender.loan_because: there isn't an "even playing field", and no one should live in poverty.

lender.name: Marjolein
lender.loan_because: I like to see what good things my loan can do and I want to help other people to have a good life.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of children from 0-4 years while their parents are at work.

lender.name: Sara and Sophia
lender.loan_because: I like to lend to people who work with cars and people who help orphans!

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: A little goes a long way.
lender.occupational_info: I help people make the most of their resources and create a financial safety net for their family.

lender.name: peter
lender.loan_because: I like to help
lender.occupational_info: I am a writer and editor.

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: I believe that this is the best kind of charity you can have, one that involves responsibility and accountability of the recipients.

lender.name: robert
lender.loan_because: i know what its like to have a good idea and no funding!
lender.occupational_info: i work in a planetarium (sky theater). i instruct the public about astronomy and maintain the equipment in the planetarium. part of my job is maintaining a star projector that is one of two left in the world.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I was lucky enough to have enough funding for my small businesses. Having travelled repeatedly to Central and South America, I would like to empower small-business women to become successful.
lender.occupational_info: I have several small businesses: I create jewelry and other accessories and sell them online, I teach piano lessons and I co-own and manage a limousine business.

lender.name: Benoit
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people.
lender.occupational_info: i write things to help people getting relief from their chronical C hepatitis

lender.name: frank
lender.loan_because:
I hope to raise recurring residual streams in the future to fund projects like this and others. I believe everyone can make a difference even if it is only a small donation at first. If we recognize where help is most needed and we address those issues without discrimination we stand a good chance in making real development growth possible. I donate because I want to donate, not because I have to? I have created an article that may bring in commissions which if set on an autopilot system, and correct payment processors are in place, this could very well be what I have pursued to create.
http://www.dofollowuntacticcal000.com/Mass_Articles/Changing Lives In The Manner Of Creating A Purpose0.pdf
lender.occupational_info: In simply recognizing that there is a much greater need for those of us who have access to online tools and secured systems, to make a concerted effort towards changing lives with the hope that we can one day finally eradicate poverty. Even now as I am a self-made homeless man on the streets of Perth in Western Australia, I recognize the importance of donating and micro-financing, it is the future of all our people for the future. http://au.news.yahoo.com/thewest/a/-/wa/9098758/photo-helps-widower-get-back-on-feet/

lender.name: Riemke
lender.occupation: yoga teacher and Ayurvedic massage therapist
lender.loan_because: "Wat je bezit is op weg naar anderen" "Whatever you own today is already on its way to someone else" (Dutch poet Willem Hussem, translated into English by me) ***** Running a small business myself, I can't but feel deep respect and admiration for all those brave women who do the same in much more difficult circumstances.

lender.name: Noah
lender.loan_because: The world is smaller and smaller everyday and we are all one.
lender.occupational_info: Recording and producing music.

lender.name: Project2000International
lender.loan_because:
We run the same program in Haiti and it had a tremendous impact in the lives of those not able to access the credit market. We are currently mobilizing funds for our projects in Haiti, if you can, please make a donation. If not, forward our request to your lists on our behalf.
Project 2000 International, Inc. has its core service as education. We believe that if people are educated, opportunities will result. We have now began to grow beyond our core service by providing health services, agricultural education, micro-credit and training schools in order to develop a sustainable entrepreneurial revolution in Haiti. Please, help us in securing funding for our programs. We are a 501c3 organization; your donations are tax deductible.
http://www.project2000international.org/eng_agriculture.htm
http://www.project2000international.org/eng_credit.htm
lender.occupational_info: Very rewarding in seeing the difference that so little can make.

lender.name: Madison
lender.loan_because: I want someone's dream to become a reality. I believe that it is so important for someone to accomplish the goals they have set for themselves. The feeling you get once you reach that goal is so unique and powerful that I want to help someone else experience that.
lender.occupational_info: I am a junior at the University of Michigan. I study dental hygiene and I also work for the university.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I'll let you know when I figure it out....
lender.occupational_info: Banks & computers

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: I want to. People need to be given the opportunity to succeed. This is a perfect place to do that.
lender.occupational_info: specialize in energy efficient solutions

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It changes lives and allows people to rise above their circumstances through there own hard work and efforts.
lender.occupational_info: I own and operate my own trucking business.

lender.name: ewalk
lender.loan_because: Micro Loans made to Entrepreneurs for Sustained Development Enterprises will improve the lives of millions in poverty while helping the world's chance of survival
lender.occupational_info: We take pictures of real estate for people trying to sell a house. Our team consists of our corporation, employees, customers, and partners.

lender.name: Friends Beyond Borders
lender.loan_because: My students enjoy reading about the people and projects that are presented on Kiva. We hope that we can contribute our grain of rice in the struggle against poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher (ESL/World Languages) and PD coach interested in helping colleagues consider global education and social justice issues in teaching activities across the curriculum. I organize an annual social justice tour where participants learn about the root causes of extreme poverty in the developing word. We visit the Dominican Republic and Haiti each summer and then collaborate on teaching activities. See my webpage.

lender.name: Colby
lender.loan_because: Philanthropic reasons, great thing to do with money.
lender.occupational_info: Build residential houses from 7am - 4pm, and a student/artist every night.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I am able to... and we're all in this together.
lender.occupational_info: I help provide affordable rental housing to low income individuals and families.

lender.name: Pope John Paul II School
lender.loan_because: I feel it is important for today's youth to understand how much of an effect they can have on those they do not know, by giving.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher, and my students are eager to learn about how they can help others in the world.

lender.name: Heather, Anita, Emily
lender.loan_because: as sisters, we prefer the gift of giving. Our Kiva loans are given in lieu of holiday gifts to one another.
lender.occupational_info: One sister is a pharmacist (prepares and sells medications) one is a dental hygienist (cleans teeth) and one runs a business (keeps track of money). All three are wives and mothers, too!

lender.name: anna
lender.loan_because: I am able to.

lender.name: Sheila
lender.loan_because:
Whatever you give out to others, God will eventually give back to you. This is the basic nature of God's Justice: "YOU REAP WHAT YOU SOW."
"Be not deceived; God is not mocked: for whatsoever a man soweth, that shall he also reap." (Galatians 6:7 KJV)
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: I'd like the world become a place where everyone has a chance to be their best self and live a healthy life. I hope we can help make that happen.

lender.name: Topsy
lender.loan_because: I like humans.
lender.occupational_info: Nap, eat, nap.

lender.name: Colin
lender.loan_because: I want to spare entrepeneurs the pain of bureacracy and bank indifference.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers, making programs and web sites.

lender.name: Becky
lender.loan_because: In honor of my mom, Becky Gray's, birthday!

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are motivated to help themselves and do something productive
lender.occupational_info: I work with small companies helping them with their financial and management challenges

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: It's a good thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I enable people to efficiently apply and use technology to further their Businesses.

lender.name: Jennifer and Abigail
lender.loan_because: We need to help one another.

lender.name: Ryan Allis
lender.loan_because: of wanting to help create more successful entrepreneurs
lender.occupational_info: technology entrepreneur

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I have a great life and I want to share it.
lender.occupational_info: I help to maintain computer networks for a great company, Tuthill, which is an international manufacturing company.

lender.name: Jhoanna
lender.loan_because: I want to share the blessings I have been blessed with.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I like helping people with their Lives and businesses and let them grow to help other people.
lender.occupational_info: Bookstore Clerk

lender.name: Emery
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others and empowering them to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work with groups of elders using art to help them and hopefully improve their lives. We draw, paint, create mosaics, quilt, and explore materials. Many of the people I work with have some form of Dementia or memory problems.

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: I believe that micro-loans are the best way for me as an individual to share my economic success with my fellow human beings.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired teacher of English, German, and Spanish.

lender.name: Mrs.Baum's 5th Graders
lender.loan_because: we are learning about how we can empower people less forturnate than us to succeed!

lender.name: Robbin
lender.loan_because: "Each man should give what he has decided in his heart to give, not reluctantly or under compulsion, for God loves a cheerful giver." II Corinthians 9:7

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in real people's every day lives.

lender.name: Tobias
lender.loan_because: I'm an entrepreneur in the field of clothing sales myself, so I'm supporting the fellows of my market area!

lender.name: Christy
lender.loan_because: the internet + a good idea + people, passion and cash = a great way to change the world.
lender.occupational_info: I run The Footprints Network, an online philanthropy project that harnesses the collective power of micro-donations made on the back of online transactions to fund development projects. We are one of the many organisations that want to end poverty within our generation.

lender.name: Dr. Dream
lender.loan_because:
I believe in energizing and supporting the dreams of others.
Join the Dream the Biggest DREAM Lending Team - Together We Make a Difference! http://www.kiva.org/team/dreamers
lender.occupational_info: I am an International Speaker, Author and Holistic Healing Practitioner. I support others in the Creation, Attraction and Manifestation of their Dreams into their Realities.

lender.name: Logosol Newsletter
lender.loan_because: The Logosol e-newsletter has over 35 000 subscribers all over the world. We want to support Kiva and tell others about this concept.
lender.occupational_info: The Logosol e-newsletter sends out in Sweden, Norway, France, US, UK and Germany.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: I want to help those in need, and those who are less fortunate that I am.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a President of the Spanish Honor Society. We hold weekly fundraising event, and over the past month, we've raised more than $500! (still rising)

lender.name: Kris
lender.loan_because: I love the concept of Kiva in supporting the entrepreneurial spirit of the business-owners we are lending to. It's also great to see exactly who we are helping.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a manager for a large hotel and travel company. In my spare time I also teach yoga and am a freelance writer for a number of websites and publications including dumbo feather!

lender.name: Laura
lender.occupation: I promote no kissing before marriage.
lender.loan_because: i love helping people. My mom died in the amazon rainforest, she was helping the people but she got a very bad disease, now i wanna live her dream.
lender.occupational_info: I loan money; I travel and give them belief.

lender.name: Sebastian
lender.loan_because: I think it is important to provide opportunities to people who live in places where live is not as easy as where I live. With what is to me a relativly small ammount, can be a huge help for someone else.
lender.occupational_info: Developing, Maintaining & Supporting Computer Systems and Software.

lender.name: kai
lender.loan_because: i like to help others less fortunate than my family!
lender.occupational_info: i am just a 4 1/2 year old boy!

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: I'd like to make a difference in the world. I do that by volunteering in my local community, but also feel that it's worth helping others around the world who want to grown their businesses but don't have the means to do that without us.
lender.occupational_info: I develop online properties and do internet marketing consulting. I have my own business like you! :)

lender.name: Francesco
lender.whereabouts: san casciano in val di pesa Firenze

lender.name: Attila
lender.loan_because: There are people in need, and I firmly believe that standing by and not helping a person who needs it, can be just as bad as the root of the cuase .. Everyone deserves compassion ..
lender.occupational_info: Fraud Prevention Analyst

lender.name: Larissa
lender.occupation: Job Search Coach for Immigrant Professionals

lender.name: Jordan
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: It is the least I can do to help others around the world who are working hard to improve the lives of their families and communities.

lender.name: aurore and julien
lender.loan_because: it's to my mind the best way, through this website, to help efficiently people all over the world without spending too much money in administrative expenses

lender.name: Maia
lender.loan_because: I can't think of a better place to keep my college money.
lender.occupational_info: I play all day!

lender.name: ShopAdopt
lender.loan_because: we want to give others the business opportunities that we have been given ourselves.
lender.occupational_info: We wanted to create a place where everyone who is involved with adoption one way or another, can find products to their liking. Whether it is the adoptive family or family members and friends looking for a gift for the adoptive family, everyone can find something at ShopAdopt.com.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: This program truly interests me. I'd enjoy seeing and especially helping others succeed in their financial life.

lender.name: Casey & Jenny
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone should have an opportunity to earn themselves a better life.

lender.name: Calum
lender.whereabouts: Newcastle upon Tyne Tyne and Wear

lender.name: Margareth
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I work with people to help them move forward in their lives, to achieve the best from and for themselves.

lender.name: Bryan
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I try to understand how a process called "apoptosis" works. Why - cause dysfunctional apoptosis its the root problem in many diseases; including cancer, heart disease and stroke.

lender.name: Borut
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can and because helping people makes me happy. Lending money to people from poorer countries for starting or expanding business is in my opinion the best possible help they can get. So Kiva...way to go!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student of Economics working on many additional projects on the side.

lender.name: Porter-Gaud School
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do. It is always good to help others around the world who are in need, especially when it comes to helping those who are trying to start a business.
lender.occupational_info: We are a independant K-12 school in Charleston, South Carolina. Our Jewish Life group brought this idea to the school, and everyone loved it.

lender.name: Joakim
lender.loan_because: Capital is the key to development
lender.occupational_info: Building Solar Collectors that produce both heat and electricity with double solar technology.

lender.name: Micha
lender.loan_because: I'm a convinced liberal and as a member of a liberal party in The Netherlands I find it very importent that people will develop themselves to become living a better life. Allmost every western country has a specific budget for development. In many cases this money will not reach the people where it is needed for. Therefor I find this a very good initiative. As an individual I can first of all choose my own project and secondly the money will go to that person to start her/his business to get a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I am working as an Account Manager (small business) for the Rabobank Key Accountabilities / Activities: To relationship manage a portfolio of small business customers by meeting the total banking needs of the customer, both personal and business. The portfolio will primarily contain small business customers whose business needs are generally straightforward. Typical small businesses managed at this level would include: small to medium sized agriculture operations; small to medium sized franchises; businesses with one or two locations; many professionals and small trades. Meet the personal needs of these small business customers, which may range from simple to complex, by profiling, referring, promoting, selling, cross-selling, up selling and delivering a full range of personal banking products and services, including several sophisticated products.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I think, the idea of micro finance is much more helpful than anonymous donations. Besides that I find it fascinating to contribute to a small project in another part of the world.
lender.occupational_info:
I am working for a payment service company, responsible for the ISO 9000 compliancy.
In my spare time, I work for my wife's homepage: http://maria-makri.at

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance.
lender.occupational_info: Helping companies make good use of technology.

lender.name: Vojtech
lender.loan_because: "Charity is injurious unless it helps recipient become independent." John D. Rockefeller

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I've seen how relatively little money can make a very big difference.

lender.name: Seether
lender.loan_because: Seether's KIVA loans were gifts from fans who wanted to honor the band and give something back in their name.
lender.occupational_info: Seether is a rock band with four members. Two of our members, Shaun and Dale, are from South Africa and two, John and Troy, are from the United States

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I'm very fortunate and want to share with others.

lender.name: Lee
lender.loan_because: I want to share some of my good fortune with individuals who desire to improve their lives through their own efforts.
lender.occupational_info: Before I retired I worked to purchase land and obtain permits for mining operations in the western U.S and direct the reclamation of lands once mining was completed. Now I own properties that I rent out and spend as much time as possible with my family.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I believe in the human spirit to overcome.
lender.occupational_info: I oversee about 250 people and work with budgets. But the most crucial thing about succeeding at my job is making sure those 250 people continue to have a job

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: The world is a small place. I try to do what I can to make it a better one.
lender.occupational_info: I develop diagnostic assays for sexually transmitted infections.

lender.name: Tommy
lender.loan_because: I know it will be recycled.
lender.occupational_info: Initiating a pioneer university chapter to tap into the vast pool of activism in colleges

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: "For the want of a nail..." You never know when the smallest thing will make all the difference.

lender.name: Molly & Jason
lender.loan_because: I want to help my fellow world citizens succeed and be happy!

lender.name: T'Mir
lender.loan_because: of the entertainment value.
lender.occupational_info: Someone pays me to study... Yeah, I don't get it either.

lender.name: Ayumi Sakazaki
lender.loan_because: I believe a loan means a incentive to change one's life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student of Keio University SFC. I'm interested in Social Innovation especially that how the venture philanthropy supports nonprofits to change the world together.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: To give others a chance the freedom to pursue a better way of life
lender.occupational_info: My business services several local communities by repairing and servicing computers. We treat our customers as we would our very best friends.

lender.name: Lyn
lender.loan_because: it reminds me to keep my priorities straight.
lender.occupational_info: I love my work. Recently, I asked a child if he knew he was a cutie-patootie. He answered ,"yes I do sweet pea!"

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: i can.

lender.name: Elise
lender.loan_because: People need good jobs to provide for their families. I have a very blessed life and I am happy to be able to share with others.
lender.occupational_info: I build houses.

lender.name: Brice
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I sit for 6 hours a day and draw pictures of buildings. Then I go home to my family. After they go to bed I read on the internet and do hobbies.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I CAN!!!
lender.occupational_info: i go to school everyday and play sports.

lender.name: Peta

lender.name: Al and Erika

lender.loan_because: We loan to kiva beacause we think this is a fantastic idea and beleive it to be honest
lender.occupational_info: Construction

lender.name: Chris and Lisa
lender.loan_because: We are lucky enough that we can.

lender.name: Erik
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel terrific to assist creative and energetic entrepreneurs around the world!
lender.occupational_info: I help International business people communicate effectively across cultures

lender.name: KAYE
lender.occupational_info: We are Shearing Contractors...this mean we supply the labour to the farmers to have their sheep shorn.

lender.name: Charie
lender.loan_because: I wanted to help people in an tangible way.
lender.occupational_info: I am a hematology oncology nurse, working on Bone Marrow Transplant unit.

lender.name: Brandi
lender.loan_because: I believe people deserve a chance to create better lives for themselves.

lender.name: AndrzejG
lender.loan_because: Jesus wants us to help others.

lender.name: Trudy
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: It is a good way for people of limited means to make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach theatre and Chorus in Gallup NM

lender.name: Meredith Willa
lender.loan_because: For many people around the world, credit cards and banks aren't realistic means for accessing resources. But all deserve the opportunity to obtain the resources they need to make their dreams become reality.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: The right thing to do!

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I feel it is the least I can do.

lender.name: nafla
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in some one's life and therefore I hope I can make a small good difference in this world

lender.name: George Collier
lender.loan_because: we are big community
lender.occupational_info: corporate research scientist in Telecom

lender.name: Wendy Moore
lender.loan_because: I want to empower and inspire as many people as possible. Kiva directly empowers other entrepreneurs all over the world.
lender.occupational_info: My absolute passion is to educate, empower and inspire business owners and entrepreneurs to build a targeted, responsive customer list

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I borrow from my child's future.
lender.occupational_info: Non-profit membership organization comprised of company presidents & CEOs who strive to be better leaders.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to encourage others to be entreprenuers
lender.occupational_info: I am the Managing Director of a large distribution company in the UK working in the Flooring Industry.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: I want to support small businesses.
lender.occupational_info: When someone is making a movie or TV show, there are a whole lot of people involved. I'm part of that crew. My job is to set up the lights that shine on the actors and anything else that the camera will film. We also run out a lot of thick cables to bring electricity to everyone who needs it.

lender.name: Delores, Justine, Cris
lender.loan_because: My mother , sister and I like to help women who need help and credit. We want them to be sucessfull and able to feed and educate their children.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse, and my mother is a retired teacher. My sister was a business secretary.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I believe we are all connected -- everyone on this amazing planet. And when I needed help, my friends were there for me, and I wanted to help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a writer, and my book "Love From Both Sides," tells the story of my husband who died in my arms but comes back from the "In Between" to talk about love, forgiveness and how enjoying "the now," is essential. I'm also a hypnotherapist, and I help my clients lose weight, stop smoking and create long lasting habits that lead them to having longer, healthier and happier lives. I love what I do!

lender.name: Gus
lender.loan_because: It is a small step in allowing people all over the world the right to choose to be successful and provide for those they love.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher for 12 year old youth in an underserved neighborhood in Chicago.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I like the "teach them to fish" concept of helping. It has a much more permanent effect! And it feels pretty darn good!
lender.occupational_info: Business to business and government credit and collections management.

lender.name: InMemoryOfLynnHanselman
lender.occupational_info: I repair and install computers and data communications equipment.
